title: Another Frontier Online - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Artificial Intelligence   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Strategic Battles   Sword And Magic   Teamwork   Unique Cultivation Technique   Virtual Reality   Wars   Wizards
author: Penguin   ぺんぎん
description:
Another Frontier Online is a full immersion VRMMORPG focused on swords and magic.
A system in which teams of players fight each other called 'Clan Warfare' was implemented in a major update half a year ago.

Hayato, who only has production skills, was expelled from his clan for not being able to fight.
Hayato decided to create his own clan, and not being able to capture the attention of any player, he realizes that he can use NPCs (non-player characters) with high performance AI as members of his clan.

Will he be able to win the 100 million yen grand prize?>
